tool_description: Configures alert preferences and notification settings for expiration monitoring, including timing, channels, and escalation rules.

days_before_expiry.description: Days before expiration to trigger alerts

product_categories.description: Product categories to apply this alert to

notification_channels.description: Notification methods: email, sms, push, visual

alert_frequency.description: How often to repeat alerts: once, daily, weekly

priority_level.description: Alert priority: low, medium, high, critical

active_hours.description: Hours when alerts should be sent (24-hour format)

error_messages: Invalid alert name: Alert name cannot be empty and must be less than 100 characters.
Invalid days before expiry: Days must be positive integers between 1 and 365.
Invalid notification channels: Channels must be from: email, sms, push, visual.
Invalid alert frequency: Frequency must be one of: once, daily, weekly.
Invalid priority level: Priority must be one of: low, medium, high, critical.
Invalid active hours: Hours must be integers between 0 and 23.
usage: Provide alert_name and days_before_expiry array to create basic alerts. Customize with product_categories, notification_channels, alert_frequency, priority_level, and active_hours.

alert_config_id.description: Unique identifier for this alert configuration

configuration_status.description: Status of the alert configuration setup

active_alerts_count.description: Number of products currently matching this alert configuration
